bibl.title: Clothing Culture: Dress in Egypt in the First Millennium AD. Clothing from Egypt in the Collection of The Whitworth Art Gallery, The University of Manchester.
bibl.note: front. coul., nombr. figg. et pll. coul.

Exhibition, 20 May - 10 September 2006. - 1. The collection. - 2. The dating of the textiles. - 3. Historical background. - 4. Tunics and overtunics. - 5. Cloaks, mantles and shawls. - 6. Headwear. - Glossary. Bibliography.
bibl.seg: PRITCHARD Frances, Clothing Culture: Dress in Egypt in the First Millennium AD. Clothing from Egypt in the Collection of The Whitworth Art Gallery, The University of Manchester.
Manchester, The Whitworth Art Gallery, 2006, 4°, 154 pp., front. coul., nombr. figg. et pll. coul. ISBN 0-903261-57-X. £25.

Exhibition, 20 May - 10 September 2006. - 1. The collection. - 2. The dating of the textiles. - 3. Historical background. - 4. Tunics and overtunics. - 5. Cloaks, mantles and shawls. - 6. Headwear. - Glossary. Bibliography.
